channel.title: Posts on Didik Prabowo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Didik Prabowo

item.title: Install Postgres
item.description: Install use docker Create file docker compose docker-compose.yml version: "3" services: postgres: image: postgres ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - ./dbdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data environment: - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=rahas1a network_mode: "bridge" Create folder config and create file postgresql.conf, copy and past file from https://github.com/postgres/postgres/blob/master/src/backend/utils/misc/postgresql.conf.sample docker-compose up

item.title: Kubernetes Cheetshet
item.description: References https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubectl/cheatsheet/ Preinstall Kube Virtualbox Kubectl Description and tutorial Node Tutorial Get node : kubectl get mode Get detail node : kubectl describe node {node_name} Pod Small unit at a cluster. Have more than one the container Tutorial Get pod : kubectl get pod | -o wide Get detail pod : kubectl describe pod {pod_name} Create Pod : kubectl create -f {name_file_pod.
